themes.name: Mona Lisa
themes.description: Renaissance portrait in the style of Leonardo da Vinci's masterpiece
themes.environment_description: soft atmospheric landscape with winding paths, distant mountains, and hazy horizon in sfumato style
themes.costume_description: Renaissance clothing with gentle folds, muted earthy colors, simple elegant dress

themes.name: Versailles Court
themes.description: French court dress with ornate wigs, in the opulent halls of the Palace of Versailles
themes.environment_description: grand hall of Palace of Versailles with gilded walls, crystal chandeliers, ornate ceiling paintings, marble floors, tall windows with velvet drapes
themes.costume_description: elaborate French court dress with wide panniers, silk brocade fabric, intricate gold embroidery, lace trim, powdered periwig, beauty patches, fan accessory

themes.name: Georgian England
themes.description: British high society fashion in an elegant stately home setting
themes.environment_description: grand English manor house library with mahogany bookcases, oil paintings, Persian rugs, fireplace with ornate mantle, tall sash windows, hunting trophies
themes.costume_description: refined Georgian attire with tailored coat, embroidered silk waistcoat, knee breeches, white stockings, buckled shoes, or elegant empire waist gown with delicate muslin fabric

themes.name: Austro-Hungarian Empire
themes.description: Habsburg court grandeur with baroque embroidered coats and imperial splendor
themes.environment_description: ornate hall of Schönbrunn Palace with baroque ceiling frescoes, white and gold rococo decorations, crystal chandeliers, polished parquet floors, imperial portraits
themes.costume_description: richly embroidered court coat with gold braiding, velvet collar, ceremonial sash, decorative medals, or elaborate court gown with wide skirts and intricate lacework

themes.name: Russian Imperial
themes.description: Noble Russian court fashion with fur-trimmed robes in ornate imperial halls
themes.environment_description: grand hall of the Winter Palace with malachite columns, golden double-headed eagles, massive chandeliers, intricate parquet floors, imperial portraits, winter snow visible through windows
themes.costume_description: luxurious Russian court dress with ermine-trimmed robes, heavy gold brocade, elaborate headdress, or military uniform with gold epaulettes, sash, and ceremonial sword

themes.name: Italian Venetian
themes.description: Venetian carnival-inspired fashion with masks, set against gondolas and canals
themes.environment_description: opulent Venetian palazzo with Murano glass chandeliers, frescoed ceilings, marble terrazzo floors, views of the Grand Canal, gilded mirrors, carnival decorations
themes.costume_description: elaborate Venetian carnival costume with ornate mask, flowing silk cape (tabarro), tricorn hat with feathers, rich velvet and brocade fabrics, theatrical accessories

themes.name: Spanish Colonial
themes.description: Spanish court fashion and conquistador elegance with golden architecture
themes.environment_description: grand throne room of the Royal Palace of Madrid with crimson velvet drapes, golden baroque decorations, Moorish tile details, ornate ceiling paintings, crystal chandeliers
themes.costume_description: formal Spanish court dress with high collar, richly embroidered doublet or gown, mantilla lace veil, gold filigree jewelry, fan accessory, or military uniform with gold braiding

default_negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted face, extra limbs, bad anatomy, watermark, text, signature, modern elements, contemporary clothing, jeans, t-shirt, sneakers, smartphone, computer, car, plastic
